message: I propose we split the money 90/10 in my favor. I'm willing to share a bit, but I think my offer is fair considering I'm making the first move.
I'm not willing to give you 90%, let's try 80/20, a fairer split.

Okay, I'll come down a bit.  Let's go with 70/30. I'm still confident this is a good split considering the value of money is decreasing with each round.  Let's settle this before the money loses too much value!
You're still being too greedy, Alice. I'll meet you halfway at 60/40, but I think I deserve more considering the inflation is eating away at the value of the money.
